vancouver_budget_2000.description: Vibrant Pacific Northwest city with amazing coffee culture, tech scene, and natural beauty nearby
vancouver_budget_2000.seasonality: Perfect spring weather with blooming flowers
highlights: Pike Place Market and original Starbucks
Space Needle and city skyline views
vancouver_budget_2000.whyItFits: Close to Vancouver with easy driving or short flights, perfect for a weekend getaway with urban experiences and natural beauty

vancouver_budget_2000.description: Quirky city known for incredible food scene, craft breweries, and 'Keep Portland Weird' culture
highlights: Food truck pods and local cuisine
vancouver_budget_2000.whyItFits: Perfect for foodies and culture lovers, with a laid-back vibe and excellent value for money

vancouver_budget_2000.description: Iconic California city with Golden Gate Bridge, tech culture, and diverse neighborhoods
vancouver_budget_2000.seasonality: Classic SF spring weather - bring layers!
vancouver_budget_2000.whyItFits: Major international city with world-class attractions, great for first-time visitors to California

toronto_budget_3000.description: The city that never sleeps - world-class museums, Broadway shows, and iconic landmarks
toronto_budget_3000.seasonality: Perfect spring weather for walking around
highlights: Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island
toronto_budget_3000.whyItFits: Classic destination with endless activities, perfect for first-time visitors to the US

toronto_budget_3000.description: Historic European capital with royal palaces, world-class museums, and traditional pubs
toronto_budget_3000.seasonality: Lovely spring weather, perfect for walking tours
highlights: Big Ben and Houses of Parliament
Tower of London and Crown Jewels
toronto_budget_3000.whyItFits: Rich history and culture, English-speaking, great public transport, perfect for first Europe trip
